column4: i only have swap / and /home partitions.  what other possible partitions might i want and what might their sizes be ?
/var ~4GB (or less) good for log files... you don't want to have some faulty device fill up your log files and make your system unbootable... and /boot ~500MB (should hopefully be enough)
I don't know, never needed an /opt before but I'm just running it on a few computers for personal use
